text: KFFR (88.3 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Winter Park, Colorado. The station is owned by Fraser Valley Community Media, Inc. It airs a community radio format. The station was assigned the KFFR call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on February 5, 2013. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * FFR Category:Radio stations established in 2015 Category:2015 establishments in Colorado Category:Community radio stations in the United States Category:Grand County, Colorado
title: KFFR
